meta.title: Love Eat Keep Fit — Food Coaching
meta.description: Learn sustainable weight management through simple food routines. No chaos, no stress, just a system that fits your real life.

hero.title: Hi, I'm Lana.
hero.subtitle: I help people fix the chaos that happens when you try to organise food for your weight management journey.
painPoints: You should not feel like you need a second job just to eat well and meet your calorie targets.
You should not spend hours cooking or running to the shop every day for missing ingredients.
You should not feel stressed when you try to make one meal work for different calorie needs in your family.
hero.solution: I teach you a new way to cook and shop so your meals become quick, simple, tasty, and easy to adjust for everyone, including children.
hero.promise: You learn how to eat in a healthy way without frustration and without losing your time or energy.
hero.experience: After years of experimenting with cooking, weight management, and working with nutritionists, I learned where most people get stuck. I also learned how the brain and body react when you do not get the nutrients you need. This is why cravings, overeating, and we start the weight management journey over again.
hero.goal: My goal is to help you avoid these traps and build a routine that feels good and fits your real life. You will also have support from me and from the group, because doing this alone is much harder.

story.heading: If any of these sounds like you…
story.short: It's not willpower. It's the daily friction around food.
story.problemText: Most plans are built for perfect days. Real life is busy, and food decisions happen under stress.

painPoints.title: Meal plan burnout
painPoints.description: You start strong, then fall off because cooking and grocery shopping take too much time and energy.

painPoints.title: Life on pause
painPoints.description: It feels like you have to put your life on hold just to organize food for your goals.

painPoints.title: Bland food fatigue
painPoints.description: Diets feel boring, so you slide back into fast food or sweets.

painPoints.title: No grocery system
painPoints.description: You’re unsure how to plan groceries and end up at the shop every second day.

painPoints.title: Calorie overload
painPoints.description: Tracking feels overwhelming — one more task on your to-do list.

painPoints.title: Reset cycle
painPoints.description: You do well for a week, then life happens and everything resets.

painPoints.title: Protein without meat
painPoints.description: You don’t eat meat and struggle to hit your protein needs.

painPoints.title: No-workout preference
painPoints.description: You’re not into sport and want results without crazy workouts.

story.empathyText: If so, you're not alone. Maybe you need more motivation or accountability, but that is not the real problem.
story.consequenceText: You start, stop, and reset — not because you failed, but because the system never fit your life.
story.solutionHeading: A system that fits real life
story.solution: That's why I built coaching that makes healthy eating simple, grocery shopping quick, and routines sustainable long term.
story.bridgeHeading: What changes when you have a system
story.bridge: More consistency, fewer cravings, and a routine you can actually keep.

approach.heading: My approach
approach.intro: My approach is simple. I focus on taste, speed, and consistency. You do not need complicated recipes or long meal plans. You need a routine that saves time and reduces stress. I help you understand your calorie and macro needs in a clear and simple way. No obsession. No confusion. You also get support and accountability so you stay on track even when life gets messy.

points.title: Simple & Tasty
points.description: Quick recipes that taste good and work for the whole family, including kids.

points.title: Time-Saving
points.description: Organized shopping and cooking routines that fit into busy life.

points.title: Sustainable
points.description: Support and accountability to build habits that last long-term.

items: First, you fill in a private form with your food preferences, lifestyle, goals, struggles, and measurements. Only I read it.
Then I calculate your macros and calorie targets and send them to you.
You join the group where I share weekly guidance and tips to improve your food routine.
You get access to videos and small exercises, and you send quick updates so I can support you.
We work together for two months. At the end, we compare day 1 to day 60 and close with a testimonial if you are happy with the experience.

coreOffer.heading: What my coaching gives you
items: Personal accountability that helps you stay consistent
Supportive community and 1:1 guidance when you need it
Simple cooking routines with quick, tasty recipes
Grocery system that saves time and reduces stress
Healthy and sustainable weight management
Macro and calorie guidance that fits your goals and lifestyle

coachingCommon.otherText: Explore the other ways we can work together.

group.title: Group Coaching
group.metaTitle: Group Coaching — Love Eat Keep Fit
group.metaDescription: Join the Love Eat Keep Fit group coaching program. A simple, sustainable way to eat well, stay accountable, and reach your goals.
group.subtitle: A guided coaching experience designed to help you build habits that fit real life — with weekly structure, clear steps, and a supportive community.

freeNote.label: Research phase
freeNote.text: Group coaching is currently free while I run this research phase. Spots are limited to keep the group focused and supportive.

sections.heading: Who it is for
sections.body: You want structure, accountability, and a plan that does not take over your life.
bullets: You want to eat well without hours in the kitchen
You want clear guidance, not confusion
You want motivation from a group that gets it

sections.heading: What you get each week
bullets: Simple meal structure and grocery guidance
Quick, tasty recipes that fit your goals
Macro and calorie guidance tailored to you

sections.heading: The outcome
sections.body: You build a sustainable routine that makes healthy eating feel normal — not stressful.
bullets: A system you can keep long term

group.ctaText: Fill out the form and I will send you the next steps by email.

individual.title: 1:1 Individual Coaching
individual.metaDescription: Work one-on-one with Lana for a personalized food strategy, accountability, and sustainable weight management.
individual.subtitle: Private coaching for people who want a tailored plan, direct feedback, and fast clarity.

price.note: Discounted for a total of 3 months.

sections.heading: Personal strategy
sections.body: We build a plan around your goals, schedule, preferences, and current habits.
bullets: Flexible structure that fits your lifestyle

sections.heading: Food system and recipes
bullets: Quick, tasty recipes that match your goals

sections.heading: Accountability and support
sections.body: Direct feedback and adjustments so you stay on track.

individual.ctaText: Fill out the form and tell me your goals. I will reply with next steps.

premium.title: In-Person Premium Coaching
premium.short: High-touch, in-person support for faster progress.
premium.metaTitle: In-Person Premium — Love Eat Keep Fit
premium.metaDescription: Premium in-person coaching with cooking routines, grocery strategy, and personalized support.
premium.subtitle: For clients who want hands-on guidance, in-person sessions, and the highest level of accountability.

price.limit: Only 2 people can join at this price.

sections.heading: High-touch support
sections.body: We build your routine together and remove friction fast.
bullets: Custom plan built in real time

sections.heading: Ongoing coaching
sections.body: Follow-up support so the changes last.

premium.ctaText: Fill out the form and tell me where you are based. I will confirm availability.

digital.title: Digital Product
digital.short: Self-paced course, macros calculator, and recipes.
digital.metaTitle: Digital Product — Love Eat Keep Fit
digital.metaDescription: Get personalized macros, a self-paced course, and a recipe book with grocery lists for your goals.
digital.subtitle: A self-paced digital program with personal macro and calorie calculations, videos, exercises, and a recipe book with ready-made grocery lists.

price.note: Includes 1 year of course access and a downloadable recipe book.

sections.heading: Personalized starting point
sections.body: Complete a short form so I can calculate your calories and macros based on your goals.
bullets: Clear guidance on how to use them

sections.heading: Recipe book + grocery lists
sections.body: Choose from recipes with prebuilt grocery lists that fit your macros and calories.

digital.ctaText: Get the digital product and start building your routine today.

whatWeDo.heading: You will learn
items: How to get your daily calorie needs based on your lifestyle
What macros are and why they matter
You lose fat without losing muscle
You learn how to manage cravings and understand your body's signals based on science
You eat tasty, quick, low‑stress meals
You get ready‑made shopping lists that take less than 30 minutes shopping once a week
You get weekly check‑ins and ongoing support

signup.heading: Ready to take the next step
signup.startDate: Next start date: Sunday the 22nd of February
signup.ctaText: Fill out the form below to get started. After you fill in your details, the link to the form will appear. Please complete it and wait for me to get back to you with your personal calorie targets. I will enrol you into the communication channel where you will receive the learning materials, homework, and access to the community with which we will start this journey together, all in the same boat.
signup.name: Name
goalOptions: Learn cooking for diet and fitness
signup.why: Why do you want to join? (optional)
signup.success: Thanks! I received your submission. Please complete the detailed intake form so I can calculate your personalized macros and create your tailored plan.

intake.title: Client Intake Form
intake.description: Fill out this comprehensive form so I can calculate your personalized daily calories and macros, and create a tailored coaching plan for you.

leanMuscleMassOptions.no-scan: I have not done body scan

fields.activityLevel: What best describes your typical day?
fields.exerciseRoutine: What type of exercise do you do?
fields.exerciseDays: How many days per week do you exercise?

fields.weightToLose: How much weight do you want to lose? (optional)
fields.timeline: What's your realistic timeline for reaching your goal?
fields.triedBefore: Have you tried losing weight/getting fit before? What happened?

fields.dietaryPreference: Do you follow any specific diet or have dietary restrictions?
fields.dislikedFoods: Foods you dislike or won't eat (optional)
fields.mealsPerDay: How many meals do you typically eat per day?
fields.mealPrep: Do you meal prep or prefer cooking fresh daily?

mealPrepOptions.meal-prep: I meal prep for the week
mealPrepOptions.takeout-mostly: I rely mostly on takeout/prepared foods

fields.cookingTime: How much time can you realistically spend cooking per day?
fields.eatingOut: How often do you eat out or order takeout?

fields.biggestStruggle: What's your biggest struggle with eating healthy?
fields.trackedBefore: Have you tracked your food/calories before?
fields.trackingApp: If you've tracked before, which app did you use? (optional)

fields.sleepQuality: How would you rate your sleep quality?
fields.scheduleType: Which best describes your daily schedule?
fields.cookForOthers: Are you cooking for other people? (family, roommates, etc.)

fields.whyImportant: Why is reaching your health/fitness goal important to you right now?
fields.whyImportantPlaceholder: Share what's driving you to make this change
fields.successLooks: What would success look like in 2-3 months?
fields.successLooksPlaceholder: Describe how you'd like to feel and what you'd like to achieve
fields.hearAbout: How did you hear about us? (optional)
fields.previousAttempts: What's stopped you from reaching your goals in the past?
fields.previousAttemptsPlaceholder: e.g., lack of time, social situations, stress eating
fields.supportSystem: Do you have support from family/friends for your health goals?
fields.accountabilityPreference: What type of accountability works best for you?

placeholders.whyImportant: Share what's driving you to make this change
placeholders.successLooks: Describe how you'd like to feel and what you'd like to achieve

fields.readyToCommit: Ready to commit for at least 2 months?
fields.concerns: If you have concerns, what are they? (optional)

intake.resultsSubtitle: Based on your details, here's your starting point:
intake.resultsNote: These are approximate calculations based on your input. I'll fine-tune these recommendations based on your progress.

nextSteps.title: What's Next?
nextSteps.description: I've received your intake form and generated an approximate automatic calculation above. This is just a starting point - I'll review all your details personally and get back to you with my personalized recommendations within 24 hours via email. Check your inbox for next steps!

footer.disclaimer: I’m not a certified nutritionist. I’ve worked with nutritionists, tested approaches on myself, and observed real people. This is a research phase.
